meanings.definition: A plant of the cabbage family with yellow flowers, formerly grown in Europe for its blue dye.
meanings.sent1: The woads in the garden have bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent2: She used woads to dye her fabric a beautiful shade of blue.
meanings.sent3: The woads whispered secrets to the neighboring plants.
meanings.sent4: The woads painted the fields with their vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The woads danced in the breeze, spreading their blue magic.

meanings.definition: Blue dye obtained from the leaves of the woad plant.
meanings.sent1: The artist used woads to create stunning blue paintings.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization cherished the woads for their rich color.
meanings.sent3: The woads decided to throw a color party in the dye factory.
meanings.sent4: The woads transformed the fabric into a sea of blue waves.
meanings.sent5: The woads whispered stories of the sky into the cloth.
